. It was so impressive that Joe just had to watch it. 
Joe enjoyed watching the impressive tuna so much that he lost track of time and his mom soon came to take him home. Joe's mom said, "What have you been doing here for so long, Joe?"
Joe replied, "I was watching the tuna bounce and I wanted to be a fisherman like them one day."
Joe's mom smiled and said, "That's a wonderful dream, Joe. You should always follow your dreams no matter how hard it may seem."
